GK16vcamkc_u:2732: so 'yaṃ ca kāraṇabāhulyena purāṇachāyāṃ smṛtipathamavatāraya nnātīva camatkārakārītyasmākaṃ matam /
GK16vcamkc_u:2737_1: samuccīyante na vyañjayantīti bahuvacanaṃ samāsaśca na bhavatīti so 'yamuttarapadagatadyotako
GK16vcamkc_u:2741: kāvyaṃ praśastaṃ tava kagīrtanaṃ ca satāṃ śriyāṃ sajjanarañjanaṃ ca // Ckc_8.*86 //
GK16vcamkc_u:2742: atra kāvyaṃ kīrtanaṃ ceti dve kriye /
GK16vcamkc_u:2744: evaṃ bahūnyapi vastūni dvandvaśa uttarapadavartinā dyotakenāvirāsīdityekasyāṃ kriyāyāṃ niveśyante /
GK16vcamkc_u:2745: tena santīti bahuvacanaṃ dvandvasamāsaśca na syāditi so 'yamubhyavargāśrayassamuccayaḥ /
GK16vcamkc_u:2751_0: atra nāyakaprabhānāyakau dve dravye paśyetyekasmin guṇapade yaditaretarayogena niveśite
GK16vcamkc_u:2751_1: taddvayorityatra tadviśeṣaṇayośca dvivacanavikṣāyāṃ samāsaśca bhavatīti so 'yaṃ tathokta
GK16vcamkc_u:2755: śrīsiṅgabhūmiramaṇe taruṇījanānāṃ bhāvasthitiṃ piśunayanti sakhījanāya // Ckc_8.*88 //
GK16vcamkc_u:2756: atrāvalokitaceṣṭāsmitamiti vastvanitaretarayogena taruṇījanānurāga nivedanakriyāyāṃ niveśyata iti so 'yamanubhayāśrayetaretarayogassamuccaya eva /
GK16vcamkc_u:2759: saundaryaṃ madane sukhaṃ surapatau bhāgyaṃ nidhīnāṃ prabhau kāruṇyaṃ raghunāyake caturimā cāṇūramalladviṣi /
GK16vcamkc_u:2760: dharmo dharmatanūbhave vitaraṇaṃ vidyādharādhīśvare tatsarvaṃ śritavatsale vilasati śrīsiṅgabhūmīśvare // Ckc_8.*89 //
GK16vcamkc_u:2761: atra sarvaṃ tadityanena saundaryādīnāṃ samudāya evānusandhīyate /
GK16vcamkc_u:2763: sa ceha tadityekavacanāntena napuṃsakena ca kathyate /
GK16vcamkc_u:2765: dyotaka iti so 'yamunabhayāśrayaḥ samahāraḥ samuccaya eva /
GK16vcamkc_u:2771: sādhūnāṃ parirakṣaṇāya dharaṇīṃ jitvā bhajethāḥ śriyaṃ paṅktiñca pratiyāyināṃ punarapi sve sve pade sthāpitā // Ckc_8.*90 //
GK16vcamkc_u:2772_0: atra bhajethā iti nāyakakartṛkāṃ śrīkarmakatvena kriyāmupanyasya tatkartṛkameva pratipālanakarmasaṃsthāpanakriyāṃ
GK16vcamkc_u:2772_1: tva nvācayena niveśitamiti so 'yamanvācayo 'pi samuccayabheda eva /
GK16vcamkc_u:2775: kāntārakṣitivāsakhinnamanasā kānta tvayā sevituṃ śrīsiṅgakṣitināthamandhranagarī gamyeti ced gamyatām /
GK16vcamkc_u:2778: yaṃ deśaṃ pradadhāti te sukṛtadhīstatraiva janmāstu me // Ckc_8.*91 //
GK16vcamkc_u:2779: atra gamyatāmiti kathitasya vidhivākyasyaivānukūlayaiva janmāntarāśiṣā maraṇasūcanāniṣedhaḥ kriyata iti so 'yaṃ vidhyākṣepaḥ /
GK16vcamkc_u:2781: na hi vayaṃ kavayaḥ kavayastu ye nagariguṇānasato 'pi vivṛṇvate /
GK16vcamkc_u:2782: nigadituṃ na hi siṅgavasundharābhuji santo 'pi guṇānvayamīśmahe // Ckc_8.*92 //
GK16vcamkc_u:2783: atra neśmahe iti niṣedhena kavitvalakṣaṇasyāropitaguṇavarṇanasya niṣedhaḥ dharmata iti so 'yaṃ vidhyākṣepaḥ (niṣedhākṣepaḥ?) /
GK16vcamkc_u:2787: siṅgakṣoṇīramaṇasaraṇiṃ mānamunmānadhītvaṃ yadyad dravyaṃ karayasi paraṃ pratyahopārjanena /
GK16vcamkc_u:2788: tattatpātre nihitamasakṛdvismarasyeva citte kāryasyānte ka iva hi bhavet kāṅkṣaṇā yaḥ prabhūṇām // Ckc_8.*93 //
GK16vcamkc_u:2789: atra nāyakasya pātradattadharmadravyānanuśocanalakṣaṇaṃ vastu prastutya tatsādhanasamarthaṃprabhusvabhāvalakṣaṇaṃ vastvantaramupanyastamiti sāhasaṃ ṣaṅguṇaṃ hi /
GK16vcamkc_u:2794: na yānaṃ prasunaṃ na ca surabhaigandhi praharaṇaṃ na maurvī vācāṭī na ca dhanurayatnātimadhuram /
GK16vcamkc_u:2795: tathāpi śrīsiṅgakṣitipatirayaṃ cañcaladṛśāṃ vidhatte saṃmohaṃ manasi nitarāṃ manmatha iva // Ckc_8.*94 //
GK16vcamkc_u:2796: atra puṣparathādidravyāsaṃbhave 'pi nāyakena yadidaṃ mattakāśī cittasaṃmohanakaraṇaṃ tena rūpādiśaviśeṣakāraṇaṃ pratīyata iti seyaṃ pratīyamānaheturviśeṣoktiḥ /
GK16vcamkc_u:2801: atrāśvastetyādiviśeṣaṇairmahī vahanakriyāyā ananyasādhāraṇalakṣaṇa upaskāra iti so 'yaṃ kriyāparikaraḥ /
GK16vcamkc_u:2806: dharaṇī kuśalaṃ gamitā hariṇā hariṇā hariṇā hariṇā hariṇā // Ckc_8.*96 //
GK16vcamkc_u:2807: atra hariṇā hariṇā ityādi śabdaikāvalyā vibhinnārthayā nāyakalakṣaṇaṃ kartṛkārakamupaskriyata iti so 'yaṃ śabdaikāvalī kārakaparikarabheda eva /
GK16vcamkc_u:2813: ārūḍhāni yaśāṃsi tetribhuvanaṃ śrīsiṅgapṛthvīpate gotragrāvamahāguhāḥ kṣitibhujāṃ bṛndāni mandaujasām /
GK16vcamkc_u:2814: tallakṣmīlalitāni lālitagirāṃ vidvajjanānāṃ gṛhān tadvākyāni ca tāvastutikathāślokyāni karṇau satām // Ckc_8.*97 //
GK16vcamkc_u:2815: atra kriyāvācinā gūḍhānītīvapadena prathamapādādivartinā sarvavākyāni dīpyanta iti tadidamādidīpakam /
GK16vcamkc_u:2819: dīvyanti divyavanitāsmitacandrikābhiḥ śrīsiṅgabhūpa tava kīrtivilāsacandrāḥ // Ckc_8.*98 //
GK16vcamkc_u:2820: atra krīḍārtha eva pādādikriyāsvāvartamānaḥ sarvavākyāni dīpayatīti seyamarthāvṛttirapi dīpakameva /
GK16vcamkc_u:2824: tatra prajāsantoṣaḥ kairavaścetyarthayorāvartamānaṃ kumudamiti padaṃ dve vā dīpayati padāvṛttirapi dīpakameva /
GK16vcamkc_u:2826: yathātraiva rājetyarthaḥ śabdaścāvartamānavākyadvayamuttejayata iti seyamubhayāvṛttirapi dīpakameva /
GK16vcamkc_u:2828: kīrtiḥ krīḍati siṅgabhūpa talapaterniryatnaratnāṅkuraṃ pātālo phaṇilokapuṅgavaphaṇāprāsādamāseduṣī /
GK16vcamkc_u:2830: atra kriyākartṛkasaṃbandhapadāni prativākyāmāvṛttāni saṃpuṭatayā dīpayantīti saṃpuṭāvṛttirapi dīpakameva /
GK16vcamkc_u:2832: paripāṭhyā tu bhaṇanaṃ śabdasyārthasya vā kramaḥ // Ckc_8.55 //
GK16vcamkc_u:2837: atra samāsaparipatitānāṃ guṇānāñca krameṇa pratyekaṃ yojanamiti samastaśabdakramo 'yam /
GK16vcamkc_u:2841: atra pūrvādīnāṃ namaskārādīnāṃ samāsarahitādīnāṃ yathākramamananvayo vivakṣita iti so 'yamasamastaśabdakramaḥ /
GK16vcamkc_u:2842: samastāsamastaśabdakramarupa ubhayakramo yathā hariśvandro rakṣākaraṇarucisatyeṣviti pūrvodāhṛtam //
GK16vcamkc_u:2843_0: atra prathamatṛtīyayoḥ pādayoḥ samastānāṃ rakṣākaraṇādīnāñca guṇānāmasamaktānāṃ tadguṇakatāṃ
GK16vcamkc_u:2843_2: gāṅgeyagāṅgeyānāṃ ca kramasamanvayo na vivakṣita hati so 'yamubhayakramaḥ /
GK16vcamkc_u:2849: paśvārdhe paridhānatāṃ hi dadhate saṃvyānatāṃ vakṣasi prāyo mūdhnyavaguṭhanatvamadhare...dasāṃ vā stumaḥ // Ckc_8.*103 //
GK16vcamkc_u:2850: atra vardhamanāyāḥ nāyakakorteḥ pratināyakaśuddhāntakāntāśarīrapradeśeṣu kramasaṃkrāntyā yo 'yaṃ paridhānādaupamyalābhaḥ /
GK16vcamkc_u:2853: apāṃ śoṣoddhārā vipatanabhiyā haṃsagilanā- ttuṣāraissītārtī virahijanaśayyādikatayā /
GK16vcamkc_u:2854: vidhitvā sāpāyaṃ jalaruhakulaṃ tadvijahatī sthitiṃ dhatte siḍgakṣitipatirapāye tvayi ramā // Ckc_8.*104 //
GK16vcamkc_u:2855: atra jalaśoṣādīnāṃ jalajāpāyahetūnāṃ grīṣmādivasantāvadhi kālakrameṇa bhaṇanāt kālator'thakramo 'yam /
GK16vcamkc_u:2856: miṣato vākrapravṛttiryā sa paryāya itīryate // Ckc_8.56 //
GK16vcamkc_u:2858: hanta krośati śārikānavarataṃ mṛdhnāti līlāmṛgaḥ śrāntāḥ kelicaṇautikāra vikaṭairbāhye sthitā vallakī /
GK16vcamkc_u:2859: ityālāpini nirgate priyasakhīvarge navoḍhā priyā bhūpālena sakhījanānusaraṇaṃ sparśena vistāritā // Ckc_8.*105 //
GK16vcamkc_u:2860: atra rahobhaṅgabhīruṇā vidagdhasakhīvargeṇākrośanākarṇanādimiṣātsukhena nirgamopāyo 'bhihita iti so 'yaṃ paryāyaḥ /
GK16vcamkc_u:2861: evaṃ kāryamiṣataḥ kāraṇokte ravivakṣādayo 'sya bhedāḥ svayamunneyāḥ /
GK16vcamkc_u:2865: na hi dravyasya jātervā sākṣādatiśayaḥ vkacit // Ckc_8.58 //
GK16vcamkc_u:2867: rūkṣāhaṃkṛtayo na santi lalita bhedaṃ gatena bhruvau dṛkkoṇo 'pi na rāgameti hasitaṃ mandaṃ ca nāntarhitam /
GK16vcamkc_u:2868: dṛṣṭvāpi pratigarjatāṃ kṣitibhujāṃ saṃraṃbhagarbhaśriyā mūrtirdāruṇaceṣṭayāpyavikṛtā śrīsiṅgapṛṣvīpateḥ // Ckc_8.*106 //
GK16vcamkc_u:2869: atra mahāraṇasaṃhaṃbhe nāyakasya bhrūbhedādivikārābhāvakathanāddhairyaviśeṣo vivakṣita iti seyaṃ guṇātiśayoktiḥ /
GK16vcamkc_u:2871: śrīsiṅgabhūpa bhavatīyaparigraheṇa dharmāya yad balavate kavireṣa bhītaḥ /
GK16vcamkc_u:2872: tretādibandhumuṣitau tu dadhāti bhāgau tatte tulāṃ na dadhate prathame narendrāḥ // Ckc_8.*107 //
GK16vcamkc_u:2873: atra nāyakagatadharmaparipālanakriyāviśeṣo vivakṣita iti seyaṃ kriyātiśayokriḥ /
GK16vcamkc_u:2877: śrīsiṅgabhūpatiyasāṃsi nirūḍhasattvā- nullaṅghayanti viṣamānapi vāhinīśān // Ckc_8.*108 //
GK16vcamkc_u:2878: atra vāhinīśapadena samudrasāmantarājalakṣaṇamarthadvayaṃ tadviśeṣaṇe tu tadanukūlārthadvayaṃ ca śliṣṭamiti so 'yaṃ śleṣālaṅkāraḥ /
GK16vcamkc_u:2879: udbhedā yatra bhāvasya bāvanā seyamīritā // Ckc_8.60 //
GK16vcamkc_u:2882: ardhīkṛtālakakucāphaṇi kahkaṇena mudrā kṛtā smarajitā likhitena tanvyā // Ckc_8.*109 //
GK16vcamkc_u:2883_0: atra vidagdhayā kayāpi kāminyā priyayogyānāṃ puṣpāṇāṃ puṣpaśarapuṣpaṃdhayagandhavahābhimarśaḥ
GK16vcamkc_u:2889: śabdārthālaṅkārayoḥ śabdobhayālaṅkārayorarthobhayālaṅkārayośva saṅkara ubhayālaṅkāra eva svārthālaṅkāravaśāt saṅkarasyobhayāśritatvasiddheḥ saṃbhāvyamānatvāt /
GK16vcamkc_u:2893: atra sādhūnāmasaṃmatimasaṃbhāvanāṃ vindato 'labhyamānān sā dhvaṃsayati nāśayatīti sādhvasaṃmatividhvasi durjanatarjanamityarthaḥ /
GK16vcamkc_u:2894: tādṛśaṃ siṅgabhūpālasevanaṃ kṛtvā nijagṛhe svagṛhe sthitairbhūpairmatividhvaṃsi sādhvasamiti yojanā /
GK16vcamkc_u:2895: atra nijagṛhe nigṛhītamiti kriyāpadaṃ nijagṛha iti saptamyā gūḍhamiti kriyāgūḍhalakṣaṇo viṣayapadāvṛttiyamakalakṣaṇasva śabdālaṅkārau saṃkīrṇāviti kevalaśabdālaṅkārasaṅkaro 'yam /
GK16vcamkc_u:2898: kānane nagaravartino ripūna tatpure vipinavāsino mṛgān // Ckc_8.*111 //
GK16vcamkc_u:2904: atrevaśabdena sahārtha iva saṃbhāvamārtho 'pi dyotyata iti ekavācakānupraveśena sahokterutprekṣāyāśva saṅkaraḥ /
GK16vcamkc_u:2906: tvayā dīnāriṇā rājan kṛtā dīnāriṇo mama /
GK16vcamkc_u:2908: atra prathamārdhe dīnāriṇā dīnārīti dvitīyapādamadhyayamakasyottarārdhe samagrāmavatā kṛteti virodhābhāsasya dvayossaṃkaraḥ /
GK16vcamkc_u:2911: citraṃ janasya valayā valayā nitāntaṃ tāsāṃ sitāyatadṛśāmudare kare ca // Ckc_8.*114 //
GK16vcamkc_u:2913_0: avalayan acalayan kare valayaḥ kaṭakamavalayamiti kartṛkriyāpadayorekavacanabahuvacane
GK16vcamkc_u:2913_1: śliṣṭe iti vacanaśleṣasya tārābhirindurivetyupamāyāśva viveko dṛsyata iti śabdobhayālaṅkārasaṅkaro 'yam /
GK16vcamkc_u:2919: santrāsaudviṣatāṃ...pratidiśaṃ tvatkīrtirādhāyate tvatkītau paridhāvanaṃ pratipadaṃ gāyanti vairistriyaḥ /
GK16vcamkc_u:2920: glānirvairibahadhūlatāsu dharaṇī viśrāmyati tvadbhuje viśrāmo bhuvi siṅgabhūpatimaṇeṃ nidrāṃnti vairistriyaḥ // Ckc_8.*116 //
GK16vcamkc_u:2923: śrīsiḍgakṣoṇibhartre diśi diśi sumanomānasollāsa kartre sāndrāmindro vibhūtiṃ śuciratiśucitāṃ dharmarājo 'ti dharmam /
GK16vcamkc_u:2924: rakṣāṃ rakṣo 'dhināthaḥ kuṭilavighaṭanodyogicetaḥ pracetā vāyussaṃpūrṇamāyurdhanamapi dhanadaśśaṃṅkaraḥ śaṃ karotu // Ckc_8.*117 //
GK16vcamkc_u:2925: atra diśi diśīti sumomānaseti śaṅkaraḥ śaṃ kotviti rakṣāṃ rakṣo iti vat chekānuprāsasya sāndrāmidra ityādāvanuprāsasya sumanaśśleṣaḥ pratiśabdotthāpitena dikpāla rūpa...(madhyama?)
GK16vcamkc_u:2926_1: kramanāmnobhayālaṅkāreṇa saha saṃniveśaḥ prakāśata iti so 'yaṃ trividhālaṅkāra ...
GK16vcamkc_u:2941: iti sakalamapi kalyāṇam iti sarasasāhityacāturīdhurīṇaviśveśvarakavicandrapraṇītāyāṃ śrīsiṅgabhūpālakīrtisudhāsāra śītalāyāṃ camatkāracandrikāyāmaṣṭamo vilāsaḥ //
